entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
